title: Dozens of Loft style floor plans to choose from!
posting_body: Text ID # 5561A to my cell for more info!
Where Art Deco style meets modern luxurious living and inexpensive rents.
These brand new deluxe downtown Dallas apartments are in the Main Street district yet only a short two block walk away from the recently privatized Dallas Farmers Market.
There are dozens of floor plans to choose from within these downtown Dallas lofts, almost all of which have fantastic views.
The historic lobby below the high rise apartments takes you back in time to 1932 with all of the handcrafted finishes still intact.
Each apartment has 3cm Sliver Waves solid granite counter tops in both the kitchen and bath with under-counter mounted sinks and upgraded faucets.
The black on black appliances accentuate the art deco styling throughout.
These downtown Dallas lofts have a price point for everyone, they range in size from a 565 square foot efficiency to the 2,950 square foot penthouse.
LSGLofts boasts the most convenient parking of any of the downtown Dallas apartments and includes complementary guest and visitor parking.
Being only steps away from Main Street Gardens your dogs will love it here too.
